short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Providing a new way to search or go to a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Providing a new way to search or go to a web page. On every web page, you can click on the balloon icon, and you can type a keyword, or an address, and hit Enter. The extension will drive you to the search result or the web page you want.
